DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to validate a methodology with Psychometric tool to measure levels of patients social fragility. This tool will be dematerialized on a tablet. The answers will be then processed by a decision support algorithm, which automatically send an alert to detection of social fragility of the patient to the nurse navigators.
DOC.brief_title: Screening for Social Weaknesses and Coordination Course of Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: All new patients enter ICLN for a diagnosis of cancer Patients who can read French or patients who can not read French, but accepting the translation by a close friend or family Patient having signed a free and informed consent Refusal of participation, major patients protected under guardianship. Patient can not read French without possibility of translation by a close friend or family
